item.title: CentOS安装
item.description: 安装CentOS 这里以Mac下虚拟机的形式安装为例： 1、默认已安装Vmware Fusion、准备好CentOS镜像 2、新建虚拟机 ![image-20200705222656454](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705222656454.png) 3、拖拽镜像到安装位置 ![image-20200705222738342](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705222738342.png) 4、一直点击继续，直到自定设置，点开设置名称 ![image-20200705222954145](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705222954145.png) 5、配置处理器和内存（按需分配） ![image-20200705223112046](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705223112046.png) 6、配置网络 ![image-20200705223155850](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705223155850.png) 7、点击开始安装，用上下键选择install回车 ![image-20200705223631034](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705223631034.png) 8、选择语言 ![image-20200705223736110](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705223736110.png) 9、设置最小安装，按需选择软件，设置安装位置，直接点完成即可。 ![image-20200705224305069](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705224305069.png) ![image-20200705224528440](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705224528440.png) 10、开始安装，设置root密码 ![image-20200705224623363](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705224623363.png) 11、等待安装完成后重启 ![image-20200705231436727](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705231436727.png) 12、接受许可证并连接网络，完成配置 ![image-20200705231650258](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705231650258.png) 13、开机后需要配置用户、设置密码 ![image-20200705231839861](/Users/syc/Library/Application Support/typora-user-images/image-20200705231839861.png) 14、安装CentOS完成
